title: John Vervaeke Q&A - 2020-11-27
description:
Thank you for joining my Q&A. A few notes:

1. It starts just after 1500 EST and lasts for approximately an hour.

2. The first ~45 minutes are previously submitted questions and the last ~15 minutes are questions from the live discussion chat.

3. Patrons get priority question-asking access and have submitted questions ahead of time. Please identify yourself as a Patron in the chat if you'd like to ask a live question. You can get priority question-asking access for $2/month here, as well as other benefits including a video chat with me: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke

4. Please be respectful in your interactions with each other and with me, so we can focus on solutions to the Meaning Crisis.

You can join the discord community to chat with others who are exploring and extending my work here: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
